text: Richard Shotwell / Invision / AP / REX / Shutterstock Jonathan Van Ness has an extremely good year and above all an extremely good day. When the Emmy nominations were announced this morning, Van Ness was surrounded by his Queer Eye co - stars to discover that not only the critically acclaimed Netflix series was nominated for an Emmy, but also his hilarious game of Thrones summary of thrones. After Gay of Thrones also received a nomination in 2016, it was not eligible in 2017 due to the fact that Game of Thrones was broadcast later. Apart from the fact that Game of Thrones had deprived him of another year at the Emmys, he also provided for a pretty interesting schedule for Jonathan. ` ` Last year, I shot Gay of Thrones and Queer Eye at
